version_description:
- Squashed some bugs to give you a better shopping experience. Note that this update requires iOS 9 or greater. Please update your operating system for the best experience.

- How are we doing? We are always working to improve this app and your experience! Let us know how we can help by contacting us at app-feedback@hollisterco.com

- Squashed some bugs to give you a better shopping experience. Note that this update requires iOS 9 or greater. Please update your operating system for the best experience.

- How are we doing? We are always working to improve this app and your experience! Let us know how we can help by contacting us at app-feedback@hollisterco.com

- Squashed some bugs to give you a better shopping experience. Note that this update requires iOS 9 or greater. Please update your operating system for the best experience.

- How are we doing? We are always working to improve this app and your experience! Let us know how we can help by contacting us at app-feedback@hollisterco.com

- Squashed some bugs. We're always working to make a better experience for you! Keep those updates turned on for the latest and greatest HCo app.

- Don't forget to scan a barcode for quick details, find another color or size and see what others are saying in ratings & reviews!

- How are we doing? Send us your feedback at app-feedback@hollisterco.com

- We will let you know when you're close to Free Shipping. Add some items to your bag and check it out!

- Fixed that annoying freezing issue. Our bad.

- Shop Local! See which products are available in your local Hollister store through the app.

We are always working to improve the app and your experience! Let us know how we can help by contacting us at app-feedback@hollisterco.com!

This is a big one, you're not going to want to miss it!
- Shop Local! See what products are available in your local Hollister store through the app.
- Low inventory notifications. We hate it when we miss out on a great buy. Now we will give you a heads up when an item in your bag runs low on inventory while you're using the app.
- Get to where you want to go in the app faster with 3D Touch. Long press on the Hollister icon and you're on your way.
- To top it all off, we improved translations!
- We are always working to improve the app and your experience. Let us know how we can help by contacting us at app-feedback@hollisterco.com!

- Scan to Shop: Now you can find products by scanning photos/screenshots of your favorite looks! Just tap the camera icon in the top left corner of the explore tab and choose a picture from your phone's photo gallery or just take a new photo. We'll show you any similar items we have in stock.
- Send Hollister stickers to your friends with our iMessage app!
Have an issue you want us to fix? Want to see a new feature in our app? Help us improve by sending your feedback to app-feedback@hollisterco.com

Gearing up for the Holiday Season has never been easier.

- Additional Images included in with products
- Quickview enabled for faster adding of items to your bag.
- Supporting iOS 12
- Performance Improvements for smoother holiday shopping
- Eliminated bugs

Have an issue you want us to fix? Want to see a new feature in our app? Help us improve by sending your feedback to app-feedback@hollisterco.com
